evidence.claim: Vosita utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure, indicating reliance on scalable cloud services.
The platform supports FHIR standards for health data exchange, ensuring compatibility with EHR systems.
Vosita's implementation of HL7 messaging showcases its commitment to healthcare interoperability.
X12 EDI transaction sets are supported for healthcare claims processing, reflecting compliance with industry standards.

icp.icp_reason: Vosita's use of X12 EDI and health tech aligns with our ICP criteria.
